file_content.text: Don't worry about me. The adrenals will kick in soon.
Thank you! Jeelta's a monster! There's no telling what he would have done to me!
Master Fraal was the one who uncovered my betrayal. He's a wise Jedi, too smart for his own good.
He put the Three Families in charge, then left Quesh a few years ago. Now he's back to drive off the Empire.
I look forward to meeting this Jedi. And cutting him in half.
He will fail.
You'll find him with Broga the Hutt. He's the last of us leaders on the loose. Left just before you arrived.
"Three Families"? Where's the third Hutt leader?
Wait. I'm short one Hutt.
Broga? He left right before you arrived. Master Fraal must have sensed your attack and warned him.
Listen--I'm a smart Hutt. I know Moff Dracen will want me dead. But I'll help the Empire find Broga.
You won't live to see him die.
Wait! I can help you track down Broga. He's the last of us leaders on the loose. Left just before you arrived.
I'll even sweeten the deal. Let me live, and I'll give you my best adrenals. Grade A stuff, I swear!
Hand over the adrenals, and we're even.
Deal. Give me your stuff.
You won't regret this! I'll keep my deal with the Empire!
But first I'm just going to take some adrenals and forget this whole mess happened.
Silence, Hutt. [Kill Portho]
Argh!
First you hog my adrenals, now you betray the Three Families! I should feed you to my rancor!
Wait! Jeelta--you know me! We grew up in this business together!
Calm down! The Three Families must remain united. You are vital to the Republic's mission.
Your Hutt allies will soon be the Empire's victims, Jedi.
The Republic's finished.
Cute pep talk. Pity it won't save your Hutts.
Your words are pointless.
Quesh belongs to the Empire now.
The Republic's done for.
Your defenses were pathetic. I hope killing these Hutts is more challenging.
Not vital enough to protect.
Pardon me.
You're ruining the show, Jedi. Let's place bets and watch this play out.
Don't stop the fun now.
What are you doing here?
You've led Sith into our home, Portho? I'll kill you!
Portho--I'll kill you for letting this Imperial filth inside our palace!
You've let this scum into our palace, Portho? I'll tear you apart!
Silence, Jeelta! If you value your power, bring me the intruders.
I'll find you, even if I have to wade through all the Hutt guts on Quesh.
I'll come after you myself.
I've always wanted to see a Hutt fight.
This should be entertaining.
Enough! Guards--attack this scum!
Finally. A fight.
Guards! Come quick!
Blow the generators! They'll overload the force field and fry Jeelta!
Your rancor's hungry. I bet you'll keep him full for months.
Nope. [Feed Portho to rancor]
